mapper.select: SELECT P.Position_ID positionId, P.Position_Name positionName FROM Position_Data P

SELECT Account_ID leaderId, Account_Name leaderName FROM Account_Data A LEFT JOIN T_Employee_Basic EMP ON A.Account_ID = EMP.Account LEFT JOIN T_Department DEPT ON EMP.Department_ID = DEPT.ID LEFT JOIN Position_Data PD ON A.Position_ID = PD.Position_ID LEFT JOIN Position_Type PT ON PD.PositionType_ID = PT.PositionType_ID WHERE EMP.IsDelete = '0' AND EMP.State = '1'
AND DEPT.ID = 0
AND DEPT.ID = 50 AND (PD.Position_Name = '副总经理' OR PD.Position_Name = '集团总经理助理')
AND DEPT.ID = 39 AND PD.Position_Name = '办公室主任'
AND (PT.PositionType_ID = 5 OR Position_Name = '项目经理' OR PT.PositionType_ID = 6) AND DEPT.ID IN ( SELECT ID FROM [dbo].[f_GetChild] (#{deptId}) UNION SELECT ID FROM [dbo].[fnGetFather] (#{deptId}) )

SELECT Account_ID handId, Account_Name handName FROM Account_Data A LEFT JOIN T_Employee_Basic EMP ON A.Account_ID = EMP.Account WHERE EMP.IsDelete = '0' AND EMP.State = '1' AND EMP.Department_ID = 23
